text: Forever Yours (, translit. Hubb lel-abad) is a 1959 Egyptian romantic drama movie directed by Youssef Chahine and starring Mahmoud el-Meliguy, Nadia Lutfi, Ahmed Ramzy. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 romantic drama movies Category:Egyptian movies Category:Movies directed by Youssef Chahine
title: Forever Yours (1959 movie)
